title: Billing Dispute - Incorrect Discount
description: A customer claims their promotional 'loyalty' discount was not applied to their latest bill.

tasks.description: Retrieve customer account and the bill in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and the bill.

tasks.description: Check the account's active promotions and their terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a 12-month loyalty discount should be active.

tasks.description: Apply a manual credit for the missing discount amount and ensure the promotion is fixed for future bills.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent credits the current bill and re-applies the promotion code to the account.
